main.title: Welcome to the WebAR experience of the Schleswig-Holstein State Museums.
main.text: Please select a museum from the list below.

welcome.welcomeImageAltText: An illustration of one of the museum's Augmented Reality experiences

step1.text: You need an AR-compatible mobile device (most smartphones and tablets since 2016 should support it). Please check the full device list of Apple and Android.
step1.iconAltText: Illustration of a mobile phone with a confirmation symbol on its screen.

step2.text: Go to one of the Augmented Reality locations that you can find in the museum. You can click on the map symbol (bottom right) and find the list of AR locations in each museum.
step2.iconAltText: Illustration of a QR code in a map symbol

step3.text: If you are not in the museum, select a location from the location list, and in the location page, click on 'Start Augmented Reality'
step3.iconAltText: Illustration of a hand that shows on a mobile phone screen that shows a map icon

step4.text: Open the QR scanner and scan the QR code that you can find at the AR location. Make sure you allow the app to use your camera and that your device is not in silent mode.
step4.iconAltText: Illustration of a hand that holds a mobile phone, which shows a QR code on its screen

relatedMuseums.title: Discover more museums with AR
relatedMuseums.text: You can also use this AR app to visit these other museums of the Schleswig-Holstein State Museums. Try it out!

welcome.defaultAudioDescriptionText: Audio description of the museum welcome page content

station.defaultAudioDescriptionText: Audio description of the AR experience content

startAR.arIconAltText: Eine Abbildung eines Smartphones mit einem Augmented-Reality-Symbol

arError.text: We are unable to provide you with this content because your phone unfortunately does not support Augmented Reality. Please try again with a different device. Refer to the compatible devices list from Apple and Android.

stationsOverview.title: Locations
stationsOverview.noContentTitle: No more locations available at this time.
stationsOverview.noContentText: Come back at a later time.

mapViewer.imageDefaultAltText: Map image of the location of the AR experience at the museum

step1.text: Scan the QR code and click on the 'Start Augmented Reality' button to start the experience.
step1.imgAltText: Illustration of a hand that points towards a button on a mobile phone screen. The button says Start Augmented Reality.

step2.text: Point the phone camera forward and scan your environment until the AR object is visible.
step2.imgAltText: Illustration of a hand holding a mobile phone, which shows a 3D object on its screen.

step3.text: A well-lit environment and headphones are recommended for a better experience.
step3.imgAltText: Illustration of a surface being lit by a light source.

step4.text: You can move around the AR object to see more. You can also move and scale the AR object with your fingers.
step4.imgAltText: Illustration of a hand holding a mobile phone, which shows a 3D object on its screen.

header.imageDefaultAltText: An image that shows a preview of the Augmented Reality experience in a location at the museum

arNotAvailable.title: Oops...
arNotAvailable.text: Augmented Reality is not supported by your device or browser. Please try again using a compatible device and browser. Refer to the compatible devices list from Apple and Android.

imageCarousel.imageDefaultAltText: An image part of an image gallery

videoPlayer.videoNotSupportedMsg: Your browser does not support HTML5 video.

cookieBanner.title: This website uses cookies
cookieBanner.text: In order to optimally design this website for you and, we use cookies. By continuing to use the website, you agree to the use of cookies. For more information on cookies, please see our
